### connectToSink() {#a993771e7c58c60044cbc4c57f689406e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Instruction &#42; RandomIRBuilder::connectToSink (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; Insts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}>
Find a viable user for <code>V</code> in <code>Insts</code>, which should all be contained in <code>BB</code>.

This may also create some new instruction in <code>BB</code> and use that.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-h/#l00095">95</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-h">RandomIRBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-cpp/#l00291">291</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-cpp">RandomIRBuilder.cpp</a>.

### findOrCreateGlobalVariable() {#a45a66620cecb92a4ffdc36042859c575}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; GlobalVariable &#42;, bool &gt; RandomIRBuilder::findOrCreateGlobalVariable (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; Srcs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fuzzerop/sourcepred">fuzzerop::SourcePred</a> Pred)</>}>
Find or create a global variable.

It will be initialized by random constants that satisfies <code>Pred</code>. It will also report whether this global variable found or created.

### findOrCreateSource() {#a47a923aecde90d3d6e66e00bab23318d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; RandomIRBuilder::findOrCreateSource (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; Insts)</>}>
Find a &quot;source&quot; for some operation, which will be used in one of the operation&#39;s operands.

This either selects an instruction in <code>Insts</code> or returns some new arbitrary <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-h/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-h">RandomIRBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-cpp/#l00109">109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-cpp">RandomIRBuilder.cpp</a>.

### findOrCreateSource() {#a8688fe7e12511bba710a19b4aaf027a1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; RandomIRBuilder::findOrCreateSource (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; Insts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; Srcs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fuzzerop/sourcepred">fuzzerop::SourcePred</a> Pred, bool allowConstant=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}>
Find a &quot;source&quot; for some operation, which will be used in one of the operation&#39;s operands.

This either selects an instruction in <code>Insts</code> that matches <code>Pred</code>, or returns some new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> that matches <code>Pred</code>. The values in <code>Srcs</code> should be source operands that have already been selected.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-h/#l00076">76</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-h">RandomIRBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-cpp/#l00114">114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/fuzzmutate/randomirbuilder-cpp">RandomIRBuilder.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
